actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Financing Bank Act of 1973 to provide funds to general units of local government in financial distress.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Financial Bank to purchase general obligation bonds of units of local government when such bonds are issued to satisfy existing liabilities of such units of government; when the maturity of such obligations does not exceed two years; and when such unit of government has submitted a plan to achieve a balanced budget within two years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Financing Bank Act of 1973 to provide funds to general units of local government in financial distress.
